skills.name: Laser
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies will take more DMG, with DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less).

skills.name: Devouring Impact
skills.description: [SP: 25][CD: 20s] Slams the ground with robot arms to unleash a psychic impact wave that generates multiple explosions. Each explosion deals 207 Fire DMG and ignites enemies, dealing 130 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 4s. Casting the skill boosts Valkyrie's Move Speed by 70% for 1.5s.
